description: Component able to take a list of datatypes and store them to the EBRAINS Drive, as configured in the arguments. By default, this component will store the datatypes in NPY format. It also supports to store the datatypes in H5 format, if you set the H5_format parameter to True.

arguments.collab_name: Set this to the preferred Collab/repo name from the Drive
arguments.folder_path: Path to the folder where the results should be stored under the Collab
arguments.H5_format: By default data will be stored as NPY. Set this to True if you want them to be stored in H5 format.
